text: Uziel Muñoz Galarza (born 8 September 1995) is a Mexican athlete specialising in the shot put. He won bronze medals at the 2019 Summer Universiade and 2019 Pan American Games. His personal bests in the event are 20.86 metres outdoors (Chihuahua 2019) and 19.67 metres indoors (Albuquerque 2019). ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=2|2014 |rowspan=2|Central American and Caribbean Junior Championships (U20) |rowspan=2|Morelia, Mexico |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Shot put (6 kg) |17.35 m |- |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Discus throw (1.75 kg) |51.87 m |- |2018 |Central American and Caribbean Games |Barranquilla, Colombia |4th |Shot put |19.87 m |- |rowspan=3|2019 |Universiade |Naples, Italy |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |Shot put |20.45 m |- |Pan American Games |Lima, Peru |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |Shot put |20.56 m |- |World Championships |Doha, Qatar |34th (q) |Shot put |19.06 m |} ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male shot putters Category:Pan American Games competitors for Mexico Category:Competitors at the 2018 Central American and Caribbean Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Mexico Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Mexico Category:Universiade medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Medalists at the 2019 Summer Universiade
title: Uziel Muñoz
